author: Saloni Goel
title: Tweet Buster: Bakshi’s tip for young investors, a thesis for HFCs
description: Dalal Street consensus says the market is unlikely to look up on a sustainable basis.
content:
Worries over a spike in coronavirus cases, fears of this health emergency resulting in an economic recession and FII outflows came together to drive the Indian equity market into its seventh straight week of decline.
In a holiday-shortened week, BSE Sensex t… [+3027 chars]
